id: TechRadar proTechradar Pro works with GoDaddy to offer ways to improve your website
paragraph:
By
Sponsored
2018-10-20T16:51:26Z

Internet
 

Future PLC, the publisher of TechRadar Pro, has teamed up with GoDaddy to provide you with an eBook guide of how to 100 WAYS TO IMPROVE YOUR WEBSITE.This guide will give exclusive insights to the best ways in how you can make your website a better one, and more profitable for your business interests.Read on to find out about:·       The reasons why you should audit your website·       How a good design can really help your website·       How to win the SEO battle and drive more traffic to your website·       How to optimize the performance of your website·       How to get quality content on your website for free·       The importance of branding for your website·       How to evaluate and improve your website’s security·       Top tools for improving your website at little or no costWe hope you find it informative and useful – and look out for our other eBook guide, in association with GoDaddy, ‘Build your first website’, which reveals tricks and tips into your first venture into branding your business online.For more information on GoDaddy web-hosting, please see here.Techradar Pro has teamed up with GoDaddy to produce a website-hosting tips eBook, looking at how to plan your website, picking the right domain name and great ways to promote your website.TechRadar is part of Future plc, an international media group and leading digital publisher. Visit our corporate site.©
